```
[package]
name = "foo"
...
[features]
derive = ["syn"]

[dependencies]
syn = { version = "1", optional = true }
```

```
[package]
name = "foo"
...
[features]
derive = ["syn"]
default = ["derive"]

[dependencies.syn]
version = "1"
default-features = false
features = ["derive", "parsing", "printing"]
optional = true
```

```
# bar/two/Cargo.toml
[dependencies]
one = { path = "../one" }
# bar/one/Cargo.toml
[dependencies]
foo = { path = "../../foo" }
```
